title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3399/85 of 28 November 1985 on adaptations of certain regulations concerning customs legislation following upon the accession of Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSCOMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3399/85
of 28 November 1985
on adaptations of certain regulations concerning customs legislation following upon the accession of Spain and Portugal
THETHE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1986 subject to and on the date of the entry into force of the Treaty of Accession of Spain and Portugal.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
